articles.title: Lie about Beijing Secret Contact Spread by Lee Myung Bak Group Refuted
articles.content:
Lie about Beijing Secret Contact Spread by Lee Myung Bak Group Refuted
						
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors let a spokesman for Chongwadae make an official announcement that the "true intention" reflected in Lee's "Berlin proposal" was conveyed to the DPRK side at a secret contact made between the north and the south of Korea in Beijing.  It had been already disclosed before the world that it was a sheer lie. 
					 Much upset by the first announcement made by the DPRK, the group of traitors falsified the fact, claiming that there was a secret contact with the DPRK but it was a contact not aimed to have "summit talks" but wrest "the north's admittance and apology" for "the Cheonan" warship sinking case and the Yonphyong Island shelling incident. It went the lengths of denying all facts that had been brought to light and negating and distorting them without any ground and sidestepping all issues. 
					
					 Not content with it, the group orchestrated a new farce pulling up the DPRK with another lie that the "accounts " of the secret contact were misrepresented  by the spokesman for the National Defence Commission of the DPRK. 
					
					 The delegate of the Policy Department of the NDC who participated in the contact gave the following answers to the questions raised by KCNA reporter on Thursday in this regard:
					
					 As already opened to the public, the group of traitors came out to the north-south secret contact, prompted by a foolish intention to shirk the responsibility for the total collapse of the inter-Korean relations. 
					
					 By origin, the DPRK was well aware of the group's inveterate rejection of fellow countrymen and its true nature of confrontation hysteria. But when the south side repeatedly proposed having a secret contact while clarifying its stand that "it would no longer pick up the above-said two cases," the DPRK responded to it with the thought that it would not be bad to finally confirm, availing itself of the opportunity, whether it has a will to improve the inter-Korean relations and jointly pave the way for independent reunification, peace and prosperity or not. 
					
					But the attitude of the group manifested in the course of the secret contact proved that it sought only one sinister aim: to evade the responsibility for having driven the inter-Korean relations to collapse and create an environment favorable for "presidential" and "national assembly" elections to be held next year, indifferent to the requirements of the era and the desire of the fellow countrymen for national reconciliation, cooperation, peace and detente. 
					
					 A typical example of its moves was the perfidy committed by the group. It behaved so recklessly as opening to the public before any others the misrepresented accounts of the secret contact. Not content with this, the group played jugglery of persistently evading the blame for what it said and did against the nation in the course of the contact and denying them. 
					
					 We would like to cite specific facts to prove once again how nonsensically the group of traitors uttered. 
					
					 To begin with, the group's assertion that the already disclosed contact was not aimed to open "summit talks" was a sheer lie. 
					
					 We would like to quote what Kim Chon Sik, policy room chief of the puppet Ministry of Unification, uttered at the contact.
					
					 As soon as he met us, he hyped the "meaning" of the recent contact, reminding us that the contact was provided by the direct instruction and "approval" of the "president" for the purpose of opening "summit talks".
					
					 He noted that Hyon In Thaek, minister of Unification, was directly supervising the whole course of the contact and reporting about it to Chongwadae through an exclusive line. 
					
					 Kim Chon Sik emphasized the fact that the contact was different from the secret contacts the secretariat of the "president" and the Intelligence Service had, independent of the above-said ministry in the past. 
					
					 He repeatedly requested the DPRK side to keep all the accounts of the contact in secrecy till the contact proved successful as the contact was treated as a top secret known only to Lee Myung Bak, Hyon In Thaek, the chief of the Intelligence Service, the chief of the Secretariat of the President and those who were dispatched to it and if this was known to the south Korean society, it would be very bad because of its peculiarities. 
					
					 Next, the south side's insistence that it neither put forth any compromise proposal regarding "apology" nor begged for it was a shameful excuse. 
					
					 This moment, too, we clearly remember the words of the south side that the above-said two cases are the two "mountains to be crossed with wisdom" for improving the inter-Korean relations, describing them as an instruction from Hyon. 
					
					 When it raised the issue of "apology," while talking about "feelings of the south" towards the "Cheonan" warship case only to meet a prompt rebuff from our side at the contact, the south side yielded a step and asked the DPRK side to make even a compromise proposal which cannot be interpreted as "apology" when viewed by the north side but viewed by the south side as "apology." Finding this not workable, the south side said if the north side expresses "regret" at least, the south side would accept it as "apology" and roll back its policy of confrontation pursued so far and even the "summit talks" could be rapidly pushed forward.
					
					 Our side explicitly told the south side as follows: To wrest "apology" from us for the case we had nothing to do with and for the exercise of its legitimate sovereignty is an insult to the DPRK and a manifestation of the south side's sinister intention to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK. You'd better go back to Seoul at once as such secret contact is unnecessary.
					
					 The group was so pitiful and cowardly as to ask the DPRK side to "make a clear concession".
					
					 Next, the south side's assertion that it never proposed "summit talks" according to schedule nor can it make its proposal is far-fetched sophism. 
					
					As regards this, Kim Thae Hyo, presidential secretary for Foreign Strategy of Chongwadae secretariat, might clearly say about it.
					
					 When the contact came to a rupture without reaching any agreement between both sides due to the south side's unreasonable insistence quite contrary to the principled and logical assertion of our side, Kim Thae Hyo produced a program he claimed was worked out in reflection of the "intention of the 'president'," saying the "summit talks" should be opened without fail and the present authorities are pressed for time.
					
					 This was the timetable for holding secret contact once again in Malaysia and then opening ministerial talks before having "summit talks" at Panmunjom in June, in Pyongyang in August and Seoul in March next year when the "summit for nuclear safety" would be held.
					
					 The DPRK side retorted the south side's assertion, saying what is the use of having such timetable under the present situation where no agreement has been reached.
					
					 Kim Thae Hyo must remember this well.
					
					 Can the south side deny the truth, insisting it never made such proposal though it unilaterally produced the above-said timetable that specified the dates and venues of such "summit talks"?
					
					  It is ridiculous for the group to plead as nonsense the fact that enveloped money was offered only to be shamed. 
					
					 This fact can be confirmed through Kim Thae Hyo, presidential secretary for external strategy of the Chongwadae Secretariat, and Hong Chang Hwa, department director of the Intelligence Service, who were playing the leading role of the enveloped money case.
					
					 When the contact was on the verge of a rupture, Hong Chang Hwa took out enveloped money from a suitcase at the order of Kim Thae Hyo, who was going to give it to us. We rejected it at once, and Kim blushed and got irritated. Hong hurriedly put the money into the suitcase in an awkward movement and left without exchanging proper parting words with our delegates.
					
					 At first the group of traitors asserted that there was no case of enveloped money. But now it distorts the fact by claiming that the money was for expenses to be paid traditionally by the sponsor of contact rather than "reward" for leading the contact to "summit talks".
					
					  If it is usage for a party sponsoring any talks to pay necessary expenses as asserted by the south side, why didn't the south side present the enveloped money at the time of the two preceding rounds of contact?
					
					 The south side was well aware that the DPRK embassy provided lodging and boarding and vehicles. Then, was it going to pay the embassy the said enveloped money for living expenses during its stay?  Its far-fetched assertion has gone far.
					
					 The money envelope case will be recorded as another behind-the-scene story in the history of the north-south relations as it was a brainchild of such feebleminded traitor as Lee Myung Bak and his top-class servants who are accustomed to assessing everything based on the almighty dollar idea.
					
					 The DPRK already knew that the group of traitors is made up of master-hands at fabrication.
					
					 The reason why the DPRK recounts on the secret contact is that the group is now faking up new stories, not content with falsifying the truth.
					
					 Lee Myung Bak is now letting puppet Prime Minister Kim Hwang Sik who has been kept in the dark about the contact, far from being involved in it say this or that.
					
					 In the meantime, puppet Minister of Unification Hyon In Thaek who engineered the contact has had hard time, distorting the truth and covering up his true colors as a vicious mastermind in an official appearance.
					
					 The south Korean authorities are keeping the participants in the contact in complete isolation from the outer world, holding them incommunicado. And Lee Myung Bak, prime mover of the contact, is keeping mum about it in a bid to prevent the greater effect of the case, out of a fear that "any word out of the president might trigger strong earthquake or tsunami at the moment".
					
					 We want to tell those who are anxious to know about the contact.
					
					 You had better directly ask Lee Myung Bak who instructed officials to hold contact and "approved" it. Then you will understand everything.
					
					 And please ask Hyon In Thaek who masterminded the whole course of the contact behind the scene. Then you will have the whole story of it. 
					
					 It would be better to inquire Kim Thae Hyo, Kim Chon Sik and Hong Chang Hwa, participants in the contact, for more details. Then everything will become clear.
					
					 Should they continue to decline to reveal the truth and deceive their fellow countrymen and hatch plots, the DPRK will have no other choice but to make public the tape recording the whole course of the contact before the world.
					
					 The reason why the DPRK takes such measures is that the north-south relations are the most important issue common to the nation and that those measures are aimed to save the policy for fellow countrymen from being abused by some selfish traitors and to make it completely serve the interests of the popular masses, the maker of the policy.
					
					 Time will irrefutably prove the nature of the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors as betes noires who had been so brazenfaced as to make the mockery of the nation through falsity and deception, being keen on escalating confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors would be well advised to make a clean breast of the contact before it becomes too late.

articles.title: Ceremonies for Projects for Zones to Be Jointly Developed by DPRK-China Held
articles.content:
Ceremonies for Projects for Zones to Be Jointly Developed by DPRK-China Held
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- Ground-breaking ceremonies for the Hwanggumphyong and Wihwa Islands Economic Zone and the Rason Economic and Trade Zone to be jointly developed and operated by the DPRK and China took place on June 8 and 9.
					 Present there were Jang Song Thaek, vice-chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK who doubles as chairman of the DPRK side to the DPRK-China Joint Guidance Committee for the Joint Development and Management of the Rason Economic and Trade Zone and Hwanggumphyong and Wihwa Islands Economic Zone, Ri Su Yong, chairman of the Joint Venture Investment Committee, Ri Man Gon, chief secretary of the North Phyongan Provincial Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Rim Kyong Man, chief secretary of the Rason City Committee of the WPK, Choe Jong Gon, chairman of the North Phyongan Provincial People's Committee, Jo Jong Ho, chairman of the Rason City People's Committee, officials of Pyongyang, North Phyongan Province and Rason City and working people. 
					
					 Also present there were Chen Deming, minister of Commerce of China who doubles as chairman of the Chinese side to the Sino- DPRK Joint Guidance Committee for the Joint Development and Management of the Rason Economic and Trade Zone and Hwanggumphyong and Wihwa Islands Economic Zone, Wang Min, secretary of the Liaoning Provincial Committee of the Communist Party of China, Sun Zhengcai, secretary of the Jilin Provincial Committee of the CPC, Liu Hongcai, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK, Chen Zhenggao, governor of the Liaoning Provincial People's Government, and other officials of the Chinese government and Liaoning and Jilin provinces and working people.
					
					 Jang Song Thaek, Chen Deming, Ri Man Gon and Chen Zhenggao made congratulatory speeches at the ceremony held in the Hwanggumphyong district.
					
					 The speakers said that they were pleased to hold the joint ceremony in the Hwanggumphyong district in the historical period when leader Kim Jong Il made a successful visit to China again, recording a new chapter in the history of the traditional DPRK-China friendship.
					
					 They stressed that the above-said economic zone to be jointly developed and operated by the two countries would mark a new symbol of the DPRK-China friendship and thus make a good contribution to bringing greater prosperity and happiness to the two peoples.
					
					 The DPRK and China are friendly neighbors sharing mountains and rivers, they said, expressing belief that the projects of joint development and operation provided by their joint efforts would be successfully carried out in a short span of time to make substantial contribution to the economic development of the two countries and Northeast Asia.
					
					 At the end of the speeches, the participants erected a monument commemorating the ground-breaking ceremony.
					
					 Jang Song Thaek and Chen Deming made congratulatory speeches to be followed by speeches by Rim Kyong Man and Sun Zhengcai at the ceremony held in the Rason Economic and Trade Zone.
					
					 The speakers said that the zone has favorable conditions for emerging a world trade and investment hub connecting Northeast Asia with Europe and North America as it is linked with the DPRK, China and Russia bordering on the River Tuman and has East Sea of Korea.
					
					 It is the will of the parties and governments and desire of the peoples of the two countries to jointly develop and operate the zone, they noted.
					
					 They said that smooth progress in the joint development and operation of the zone would promote from a new angle the economic development in not only the two countries but also Northeast Asia and give affirmative effect on the global economic development.
					
					 They called for bringing about a turn in freight transit transportation and tourism by speedily solving the issue of electricity and winding up the projects for modernization of Rajin Port and reconstruction of Rajin Port-Wonjong road through positive cooperation within this year.
					
					 The ceremony was followed by announcing the start of the reconstruction of the Rajin Port-Wonjong road, ground-breaking ceremonies of Athae Rason Cement Factory and the Rason, DPRK-Jilin Province, China High Efficiency Agricultural Model District and departing ceremonies of Chinese domestic freight transit transportation via Rajin Port and private car tourism as the first phase projects for the start of the joint development of the zone. 
					
					 Officials of the two countries cut tapes commemorating ground-breaking ceremonies of the reconstruction of the Rajin Port-Wonjong road and the project for the object to be jointly developed and operated in the Rason Economic and Trade Zone and the departing ceremony of Chinese domestic freight transit transportation via Rajin Port.
					
					 A monument was erected in commemoration of the ground-breaking of the Athae Rason Cement Factory.
					
					 Receptions were given on Wednesday and Thursday in celebration of the ceremonies.

articles.title: 2nd Meeting of DPRK-China Joint Guidance Committee for Economic Zones Held
articles.content:
2nd Meeting of DPRK-China Joint Guidance Committee for Economic Zones Held
						
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- The second meeting of the DPRK-China Joint Guidance Committee for jointly developing and operating the Rason Economic and Trade Zone and the Hwanggumphyong and Wihwa Islands Economic Zone took place in Liaoning and Jilin Provinces of China on Wednesday.
					 Present there were Jang Song Thaek, vice-chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and chairman of the DPRK Side Committee of the DPRK-China Joint Guidance Committee, and officials of the International Affairs Department of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea, the Joint Venture Investment Committee, the Foreign Ministry, the North Phyongan Provincial People's Committee and the Rason City People's Committee.
					
					 On hand were Chen Deming, minister of Commerce of China and chairman of the Chinese Side Committee of the China -DPRK Joint Guidance Committee, and officials of the International Liaison Department of the C.C., the Communist Party of China, the Foreign Ministry, the National Development and Reform Committee and the Liaoning and Jilin provincial people's governments.
					
					 At the meeting the DPRK and Chinese sides agreed to build the two economic zones into a model of the DPRK-China economic and trade cooperation and a theatre of developing the economic and trade cooperation with other countries by the joint efforts.
					
					 Minutes of the second meeting were signed by Jang Song Thaek and Chen Deming.
					
					 The Jilin Provincial Committee of the Communist Party of China and the Jilin Provincial People's Government arranged a reception that day.

articles.title: Greetings to President of Portugal

					 Present there on invitation were Vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs Kung Sok Ung, Vice-Minister of Foreign Trade O Ryong Chol, Vice-Minister of Culture Han Chol, Vice-Chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries Mun Jae Chol and others, diplomatic envoys of different countries and representatives of international organizations here.

articles.title: Cuban, Indonesian Embassy Officials Help Korean Farmers
articles.content:
Cuban, Indonesian Embassy Officials Help Korean Farmers
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- Staff members of the Cuban and Indonesian embassies here did friendly work on the DPRK-Cuba Friendship Hwasong Vegetable Co-op Farm in Ryongsong District, Pyongyang and the DPRK-Indonesia Friendship Yaksu Co-op Farm in Kangso District, Nampho City on Thursday.
					 They included Cuban Ambassador Jose Manuel Galego Montano and Indonesian Ambassador Nasri Gustaman.
					
					 They helped farmers in dry field weeding. 
					
					 During breaks, they exchanged conversation with farmers.
					
					 The staff members of the Indonesian embassy handed aid materials to the farm.

articles.title: Senior State Officials Visit Ryongrim Dam of Huichon Power Station
articles.content:
Senior State Officials Visit Ryongrim Dam of Huichon Power Station
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- Senior state officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of party, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions visited the Ryongrim Dam of Huichon Power Station No. 1 Thursday.
					 The completion of the dam provided a decisive guarantee for completing the Huichon Power Station by 2012.
					
					General Secretary Kim Jong Il visited the construction site of the Huichon Power Station on his way home after the historic China visit and expressed great satisfaction over the successful construction of an edifice by the soldier builders which will go down forever in the history of building a thriving nation.
					
					 In front of the map showing the panoramic view of the station, the visitors were briefed on the fact that Kim Jong Il entrusted the building the Ryongrim Dam to the People's Army and visited the steep construction site to put forward Korean-style method of construction and show warm loving care for the soldier builders and deeply grasped the fact that the wise leadership, great trust and loving care shown by the brilliant commander of Mt. Paektu serve as the source of miracles.  The visitors looked round the dam.
					
					 Looking round the literary and art works and wood engravings created by the solider builders, they keenly felt that as long as there are the soldiers of the People's Army, the hurrah of victory will resound in every worksite of the grand drive to build a thriving nation.

articles.title: School Children's Study Tour of Mt. Paektu Area
articles.content:
School Children's Study Tour of Mt. Paektu Area 
yongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- School youth and children from across the country started their study tour of revolutionary battle sites in the area of Mt. Paektu on the occasion of the 55th anniversary of lGeneral Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of study tour of revolutionary battle sites in the area of Mt. Paektu.
					 A ceremony for starting the march took place before the Victorious Battle of Pochonbo Memorial Tower in Hyesan City, Ryanggang Province, on June 8.
					
					 The participants made bows before the statue of President Kim Il Sung standing at the tower.
					
					 Ham Kwang Chol, secretary of the C.C., the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, made a report at the ceremony which was followed by speeches.
					
					 The reporter and speakers said that Kim Jong Il's exploration of the road of study tour of revolutionary battle sites in the area of Mt. Paektu at the head of ranks of participants in the study tour marked a historic event that occasioned an epochal turn in upholding and glorifying the revolutionary traditions of the Workers' Party of Korea, they stressed.
					
					 They underscored the need to eternally glorify the immortal feats performed by Kim Jong Il in carrying forward and developing the Juche-oriented revolutionary traditions and learn from the transparent spirit of devotedly defending the leader and the indomitable fighting spirit displayed by the anti-Japanese revolutionary forerunners.
					
					 At the end of the meeting, they started the march toward Pochonbo.

articles.title: Steel Production Goes Up
articles.content:
Steel Production Goes Up 
Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- Steel production is on the increase in the DPRK on the basis of fuel available in the country. 
					 The Posan Iron Works of the Chollima Steel Complex has operated furnaces in a scientific way and introduced technical innovations to raise the production by 20 percent.
					
					 The Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex is building a new steelmaking process to boost the heavy rail production.
					
					 The Chongjin Steel Plant has increased the production by readjusting the proportion of raw materials to fuel and bringing processes into proper correlation.
					
					 The Musan Mining Complex, Unryul Mine and Jaeryong Mine also play a big role in increased steel production.

articles.title: Bean Yogurt Production Technology Developed
articles.content:
Bean Yogurt Production Technology Developed 
						
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- The Grain Processing Research Institute of the Branch Academy of Light Industrial Science under the State Academy of Sciences has developed a new technology for bean yogurt production.
					 The technology based on a high-temperature inoculated zymotechnics does not need any cooling and fermentation processes. 
					
					 It provides natural cooling and fermentation simultaneously.
					
					 The new method is easier than the existing one.
					
					 The technology, which won a top prize at the 26th National Festival of Science and Technology held in Pyongyang in April, has already proved effective in some factories.

articles.title: Urosaccharometry Paper Developed
articles.content:
Urosaccharometry Paper Developed
						
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- A new kind of urosaccharometry paper began to be used in public health establishments of the DPRK.
					 The paper is made by bioengineering technology.
					
					 It, convenient in use, provides an accurate and quick result in sugar content test.
					
					 The application of the paper makes it possible to improve urosaccharometry and make a correct diagnosis.
					
					 A production base of the urosaccharometry paper was already built in the country.

articles.title: Purity of Revolutionary Traditions Maintained
articles.content:
Purity of Revolutionary Traditions Maintained
						
Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- Fifty-five years has passed since General Secretary Kim Jong Il started a study tour of revolutionary battle sites in the area of Mt. Paektu.
					 The tour was motivated by his belief that carrying forward the revolutionary traditions is an important matter concerning the cause of socialism. 
					
					 Earlier, he proved in a scientific way that the only traditions to be carried forward by the Workers' Party of Korea are the revolutionary traditions established by President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 He called for maintaining the purity of the revolutionary traditions and finding out all precious treasures provided in the period of anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle.
					
					 Under his wise leadership, many revolutionary battle sites and historic sites were restored to the original state and art works created by the President in the period of the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle were adapted to movies, operas and dramas. And many books and literary works were published to help people get a good knowledge of the revolutionary traditions.

articles.title: Dressing of Koguryo People
articles.content:
Dressing of Koguryo People
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- The dressing of the people in the period of Koguryo, the first feudal state of Korea (277 BC-668 AD), was a sign of the developed culture of the Korean people.
					 Men used to wear trousers with crotches long enough to cover ankles and edges narrowed by string or cuff, while women put on long pleated skirts.
					
					 At that time, men of neighboring countries took on bell-bottomed trousers, tightened by string at the knees, and women wore long skirts with no pleat. 
					
					 Rainbow-striped skirt could be seen in Koguryo only, except Japan influenced by the Korean people.
					
					 Trimmed collar and hem were also peculiar to the Koguryo women's dress.
					
					 A historical record of a neighboring nation says the Koguryo women's dress is characterized by trim.

articles.title: Nobody Can Check Trend of 6.15 Era toward Reunification--Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Nobody Can Check Trend of 6. 15 Era toward Reunification--Rodong Sinmun
						
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- The DPRK's major newspaper Rodong Sinmun today carried a commentator's article titled "Nobody can check the strong trend of the June 15 era."
					 The full text of the article is as follows:
					
					 Our fellow countrymen greet the 11th anniversary of the historic June 15 joint declaration under the grim situation where confrontation between the reunification champions and the separatists has reached an extreme point.
					
					 The inter-Korean summit and the adoption of the June 15 joint declaration in June 2000, the first of its kind since the country was divided, were a great event that turned the history of division and confrontation lasting for more than half a century into the history of reconciliation, unity and reunification and provided the Korean nation with a great program for reunification in the new century. This brought all Koreans and the whole world into great shock, enthusiasm, cheers and admiration.
					
					 The June 15 event and consequently the amazing development of the north-south relations showed that there is nothing impossible to do on earth when the Koreans join their hands and that the Korean nation can successfully break the walls of confrontation and division and achieve peace and reunification on its own efforts.
					
					 Furthermore, 2007 saw another north-south summit and the adoption of the October 4 declaration amid the lasting heat of the June 15 event. This stirring event fully displayed the Korean nation's reserved strength and wisdom and its fixed will to usher in the era of peace, reunification and prosperity.
					
					 Immense is the effect of the June 15 event on the Koreans' movement for national reunification and the north-south relations and the internal and external situation, and its undying feat will remain long in the history of the nation.
					
					 If this trend of the June 15 era had continued to go without obstruction of the separatists, the north and the south would have made bigger strides in their relationship, further consolidating the foundation for peace in the Korean Peninsula and moving up the day of national reunification.
					
					 But, the present reality is very serious.
					
					 The results of the June 15 event were ruthlessly spoiled and the north-south relations have been driven to the furthest extreme of confrontation and rupture, the state that can be no longer redressed.
					
					 In June 11 years ago when the historic north-south summit took place, all Koreans and the whole world burst into cheers, calling it a dramatic handshake and an event of touching the hearts of seventy million Koreans and saying that the door to reunification is open. But, the then deep emotion and excitement can be hardly felt in this land, where there is a raging wind of confrontation between fellow countrymen.
					
					 The day of national reunification the Korean expected to see soon was far delayed, and the crisis of nuclear war is coming nearer.
					
					 Why did the north-south relations go back to the past of confrontation to be driven into collapse?
					
					 This is entirely because the south Korean conservative regime has totally denied the historic June 15 joint declaration and resorted to moves to escalate the confrontation and ignite a war.
					
					 All the fellow countrymen are now stunned by the fact that all the shining achievements made by all Koreans in the efforts for independence, democracy and reunification through a protracted bloody struggle were brought to naught by the group of traitors in a matter of little more than three years.
					
					 The south Korean ruling authorities denied and trampled down the idea of "By our nation itself", the basic spirit of the joint declaration, thus destroying the groundwork and the fundamental cornerstone of the inter-Korean relations, first of all.
					
					 The idea calls for independently settling the national issue and the reunification issue by the concerted efforts of the Koreans in the north and the south.
					
					 Prompted by pure patriotism, this idea does not force the ism and ideology of any party on any other party and, moreover, it has nothing to do with such narrow-minded view as one party excluding the other party or breaking with it.
					
					 This idea does not mean excluding the chief executive for a lot of crimes committed in the past and ostracizing the conservative forces such as the "Grand National Party". It calls for respecting foreign relations but asserts that they should be beneficial to the national interests, peace and reunification.
					
					 It is not bad but good for everybody to advance, joining hands with one another for reunification that would enable all the classes and strata in the north and the south to live well in peace.
					
					 That was why all Koreans unanimously supported and approved of the idea of "By our nation itself" and even the chief executive of south Korea expressed sympathy with it and signed the declaration.
					
					 The present puppet conservative group of south Korea malignantly defiled for no reason the idea of "By our nation itself", the idea of reunification common to the nation, as the "north's strategy" from the outset.
					
					 Furthermore, it declared that it would subordinate the inter-Korean relations to those with foreign forces and responded to it by rolling up its sleeves to boost them as servants for the U.S. colonial domination and the execution of its policy of aggression.
					
					 A particular mention should be made of the fact that Lee Myung Bak accepted whatever requested by his American master, totally subservient to him, claiming that everything would be OK if south Korea maintained good relations with the U.S., totally indifferent to the destiny of the nation and the deteriorated inter-Korean relations.
					
					 He extremely antagonized his compatriots and sold off the interests of the nation to his master lock, stock and barrel. Not content with this, he made the inter-Korean relations fall victim to the U.S. policy of war of aggression.
					
					 He claimed that the greatest achievement made under his rule was the restoration of the south Korea-U.S. alliance. He went the lengths of talking nonsense that the inter-Korean relations were put on a "normal orbit" though they were thrown into catastrophe. His reckless remarks eloquently prove his heinous sycophancy toward the U.S. and his consciousness of opposing reunification and pursuing confrontation.
					
					 Even the ill-famed "Yusin regime" talked about "national independence" and the "civilian government," too, asserted that the "nation should be placed above the ally, though it was hypocrisy. But Lee begged his master to delay the transfer of the right to control wartime operations of the puppet army despite the fact that the preceding regime tried to regain it under the slogan of "self-reliant defense". He zealously followed the nuclear racket and sanctions against the DPRK, blustering that he "would handle the inter-Korean relations in the relationship with the U.S."
					
					 The puppet group disallowed even the use of word "nation" in official speeches and documents and ordered officials to change it into "people".
					
					 All the successive south Korean rulers cried out for boosting the alliance with the U.S. and pursued the policy of toeing the U.S. line but the Lee group was the first group of wicked sycophants and traitors to have put foreign forces above the nation, openly adopted priority to foreign forces as a policy and disallowed even the use of word "nation."
					
					 The south Korean ruling authorities denied the national reconciliation, unity and reunification contrary to the spirit and requirements of the June 15 joint declaration, and desperately pursued the moves for confrontation with fellow countrymen and that of the systems, thus creating extreme distrust between the north and the south and rendering the inter-Korean relations extremely hostile.
					
					 If national reconciliation, unity and peaceful reunification are to be achieved, it is necessary to recognize and respect the other's ideology and system, revitalize dialogue and negotiations and head for reunification by federal formula.
					
					 This is the basic content, basic requirements of the three principles for national reunification and the joint declaration embodying them and the basic principle of the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 But the Lee Myung Bak group totally denied this important principled requirement and blatantly challenged it.
					
					 The Lee group of separatists dared defile the system of the other party. It not only kicked up a disturbing confrontation row while talking about "change", "opening" and "human rights" but has persistently worked to realize its wild ambition for "unification through absorption" on the basis of the imported experience of other country's unification while vociferating about "unification under liberal democracy".
					
					 It was the puppet group that scuttled overnight brisk multi-channeled dialogues which had been under way since the publication of the joint declaration. It was again this clique of traitors that threw bigger hurdles in the way of dialogue by putting up such preconditions as the nuclear issue and what it called "apology" and it was also the puppet authorities who brought to rupture even the dialogues opened thanks to the positive efforts of the DPRK.
					
					 Tour of Mt. Kumgang which delighted the whole nation was totally suspended, the Kaesong Industrial Zone was hit hard and exchange, contact and cooperation of NGOs were scuttled due to the confrontation moves of the puppet group.
					
					 There disappeared whistles of trains for reunification on the railways linking the north and the south which excited all the Koreans so much, and loud shouts of hurrah for reunification which had resounded forth in Pyongyang and Seoul and on Mt. Paektu and Mt. Hanna are no longer heard.
					
					 The puppet group eagerly wishes to see something take place inside the DPRK while talking about "waiting strategy" and "snail's pace". This is as foolish and stupid a dream as expecting the sun to fall.
					
					 Now that the Lee group dares make a mockery of the highest-level dialogue, there is no reason to discuss what it called dialogue between the north and the south.
					
					 It is 40 years since the inter-Korean dialogue started. A lot of official and unofficial dialogue and secret contacts took place between the two sides and several special envoys visited the north and the south in this period. But there was no such vicious anti-reunification group as the Lee group that hurt the dignity of the other party and defiled its sincerity and frantically hatched plots and pursued confrontation with sinister aims.
					
					 The south Korean ruling authorities perpetrated military provocations and pursued war moves against fellow countrymen in league with foreign forces, challenging the historic June 15 joint declaration. They thus brought the crisis on the Korean Peninsula to an extreme phase.
					
					 The June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, a programme for implementing it, clarify the issues of putting an end to the military hostile relations between the north and the south, fulfilling the commitment to non-aggression, preventing a war on the Korean Peninsula and ensuring peace there.
					
					 No sooner had the Lee Myung Bak conservative group come to power than threw away the inter-Korean declarations and got frantic with military provocations and maneuvers for a war of aggression on the DPRK after declaring the north as its principal enemy, not as fellow countrymen.
					
					 Worse still, it staged exercises under the simulated conditions of a real war after working out such conspiratorial scenarios as "emergency ruling plan" and the like, obsessed by the ambition to cope with "contingency".
					
					 Outbursts calling for preemptive attack are heard from among the puppet military warmongers and a whole string of jargons that "one should not fear a war" are let loose even by the puppet chief executive.
					
					 The warship sinking case and the Yonphyong Island shelling case, the hideous conspiratorial farces that occurred last year and the war hysteria kicked up under this pretext fully revealed the reckless and belligerent nature of the puppet group of traitors.
					
					 The puppet military warmongers committed such thrice-cursed hideous provocation as setting up the target daring hurt the supreme dignity of the DPRK and firing at it. This is the height of the moves to bring the inter-Korean relations to collapse as it is the most barbarous and cruel act in history.
					
					 It is quite self-evident that such tyrannical hooligans as the puppet group which no longer wants to remain human beings from the outset, much less being members of the same nation, can neither become a counterpart of the inter-Korean dialogue for discussing a crucial matter of the nation nor remain part of the Korean nation. 
					
					 All facts go to clearly prove that the south Korean ruling authorities are entirely to blame for the present catastrophic inter-Korean relations as they violated and stamped out the June 15 joint declaration and resorted to vicious moves to escalate the confrontation with fellow countrymen. 
					
					 It is needless to say that as long as the anti-reunification group of south Korea is allowed to stay it is impossible to expect a smooth advance of the June 15 era and achieve peace and reunification. 
					
					 It is very deplorable that the June 15 joint declaration is flouted by a handful of anti-reunification elements like the group of traitors and the fellow countrymen's movement for national reunification is delayed. 
					
					 The present acute situation in which the confrontation between pro-reunification forces and the anti-reunification forces has reached the climax makes the people keenly realize how good the June 15 era was and how dear it was. 
					
					 That is why broad circles of south Korea together with all other fellow countrymen are turning out as one in the drive to punish and overthrow the Lee Myung Bak regime under the uplifted banner of the June 15 joint declaration, unable to repress the towering indignation at the puppet group's anti-reunification and confrontation moves. 
					
					 The puppet conservative group is making desperate efforts to get rid of the position where it is attacked from all sides but this only precipitates its disgraceful destruction. 
					
					 The significance and influence of the historic June 15 joint declaration, which is deeply enshrined in the minds of all the Korean people and whose truth, viability, validity and vitality have been fully confirmed, do not get weakened due to any obstruction on the part of the group of traitors. 
					
					 On the contrary, the present reality teaches a bitter lesson that the achievements made after the publication of the June 15 joint declaration can never be lost but hardens the will and resolution of the Korean nation to accomplish the June 15 cause without fail. 
					
					 All Koreans will declare a miserable end to the south Korean group of separatists and certainly bring back the June 15 era as they keenly realize the value of the June 15 joint declaration and pin their hope on it.
					
					 They see the Korean nation's future, independence, peace, reunification and prosperity in the June 15 joint declaration. 
					
					 All the Koreans will make a clean sweep of the group of wicked sycophants, traitors and separatists and successfully carry forward with pride the June 15 historic cause and thus demonstrate their spirit once again. 
					
					 Nobody on earth can stem the strong trend of the June 15 era.

articles.title: US Attitude toward Investigation into Burial of Defoliant Slammed in S. Korea
articles.content:
US Attitude toward Investigation into Burial of Defoliant Slammed in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- The south Korean newspaper Kyunghyang Daily News in an editorial on June 4 accused the U.S. of glossing over the investigation into the case of defoliant burial by the U.S. forces present in south Korea.
					 The U.S. and the south Korean authorities started a joint investigation into the real state of defoliant contamination in the Waegwan U.S. military base but a lot of doubts are arising about its effectiveness, the editorial said.
					
					 The U.S. stand is unilaterally reflected in the investigation way and representatives of inhabitants in the region were not involved in the investigation, it said, adding that in this situation it is hard to expect any investigation results understandable to the people.
					
					 The U.S. attempts to survey less 10 meters underground by locator in places where drums of defoliant were guessed to be there and then conduct boring and measurement of pollution level only in the spot where abnormal sign is found. In case of survey into underground water it has decided to deal with only the main toxic substance contained in defoliant.
					
					 Disclosing this fact, the editorial stressed that strict investigation should be made into the case of defoliant burial as it is related to the existence of the population.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers Announces Joint Air Defense Drill
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers Announces Joint Air Defense Drill
						
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- The puppet Joint Chiefs of Staff of south Korea announced on June 8 that it would stage a joint air defense drill in the sky above south Korea except Jeju Island, south Korean MBS reported.
					 The warmongers are contemplating staging war maneuvers twice with F-15K fighters and other war hardware involved under the pretext of intrusion by someone.
					
					 The situation on the Korean Peninsula is getting tenser due to the saber-rattling being staged by them against the DPRK almost every day.

articles.title: Authorities' Attempt to Use North-South Talks for Political Aims under Fire
articles.content:
Authorities' Attempt to Use North-South Talks for Political Aims under Fire
						
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- South Korean newspaper Hangyore on June 3 carried an editorial titled "The case of south-north secret contact can never be glossed over".
					 The editorial said:
					
					 The accounts of the south-north secret contact opened to the public by the north were shocking. This would give the same great impact on both those who supported the present "government's" policy toward the north and those who oppose it.
					
					 The "government's" dual nature, lack of principle, slovenly handling, irritability and the like make people not keep mum. Nevertheless, the response of the "government" including Chongwadae was very insincere. It used again the glossing-over tactics that was employed whenever something happened.
					
					 However, the present situation has gone beyond the phase in which a matter might be settled with silence.
					
					 The contact brought the population to big puzzlement and confusion before anything else.
					
					 Hyon In Thaek, minister of Unification, told the parliamentary interpellation yesterday that the secret contact was aimed to wrest from the north its clear admission and apology over the "Cheonan" warship case and the Yonphyong Island shelling case and promise to prevent the reoccurrence of such cases. But, few people would trust his explanation because it doesn't make sense that the contact was for wresting "apology" only. 
					
					  What the people want to hear is a detailed explanation about the meaning of a compromise proposal which cannot be interpreted as "apology" when viewed by the north side but as apology when viewed by the south side. The "government's" contradictory and embarrassing attitude only makes the north's assertion plausible.
					
					What the people want to know most at present is what the basis of the "government's" true policy toward the north is. Because the "government's" announcement that it would not be webbed to summit talks proved to be a lie, putting everything in a mess.
					
					 There should be an explanation about the suspected intention to use the south-north summit talks for domestic political purposes.
					
					 If it is truth that south Korea proposed to have summit talks in Panmunjom late in June, in Pyongyang in August and in Seoul in March next year,  one after another, it cannot be interpreted otherwise than political preparations for the general election in April next year.

articles.title: Group of Traitors' Anti-DPRK War Racket Flailed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Group of Traitors' Anti-DPRK War Racket Flailed in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification released a statement on June 4 to condemn the puppet group of traitors for getting hell-bent on the war moves against the DPRK while daring hurt its supreme dignity.
					 The statement recalled that a spokesman for the General Staff of the Korean People's Army issued a statement strongly denouncing the Lee Myung Bak group for having set up a target slandering the supreme dignity of the DPRK and fired at it, 
					
					 This never-to-be-condoned monstrous crime by the confrontation maniacs is unprecedented in the world, it said, charging that the group did such atrocity while calling for talks.
					
					 It is the unanimous will of the nation to no longer overlook the DPRK-targeted war exercises and anti-reunification moves of the Lee Myung Bak group, the statement said.
					
					 It stressed that all the people in the south should punish the prime movers of this heinous treachery and wage a decisive struggle against the confrontation maniacs after setting them as its first target to root out the source of war.

articles.title: Abrogation of Fascist Law Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Abrogation of Fascist Law Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- People of different circles in south Korea joined in the struggle by the group of sit-in strikers for independent and peaceful reunification on June 3, urging the abrogation of the "Security Law".
					 They included SL victims, youth and students and members of reunification movement organizations. 
					
					 They charged that the fascist authorities have cracked down upon many people eager for learning about the DPRK or calling for reunification on charges of the violation of the SL. 
					
					 They demanded the immediate abrogation of the SL that incriminates those informing the people of the truth.

articles.title: Settlement of Registration Fee Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Settlement of Registration Fee Urged in S. Korea 
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- Students under the south Korean Federation of University Students in the 21st Century continued their struggle in demand of the settlement of registration fee on June 6.
					 They held a candlelight rally in Seoul.
					
					 Present there were also citizens from all walks of life and members of political parties and organizations. 
					
					 Speakers at the rally deplored that students committing suicide due to the registration fee are increasing in number. 
					
					 They declared that they would surely punish the Lee Myung Bak "government" turning away its face from the students' demand. 
					
					 They urged the authorities to pay attention to the voice of the students and reflect on the crimes committed by them with unpopular policies. 
					
					 After the rally the students conducted information service.

articles.title: Chongryon Officials Encourage Quake-afflicted Korean Students
articles.content:
Chongryon Officials Encourage Quake-afflicted Korean Students
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- The chief vice-chairman and the director of the Education Department of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), the chairmen of the Niigata Prefectural Headquarters and the Fukushima Prefectural Headquarters of Chongryon visited the Korean senior middle school in Niigata where students of the Korean senior middle school in Fukushima study after suffering big losses owing to earthquake and the ensuing tsunami on May 20 and encouraged them.
					 Officials of Chongryon looked round class rooms and dormitories and learned about their health and living conditions.
					
					 The chief vice-chairman had round-table talks with teachers of the above-said schools in Fukushima and Niigata and compatriots in Niigata Prefecture.
					
					 He called upon organizations of Chongryon at various levels and all the compatriots to sincerely help the people in the afflicted areas by intensifying the campaign for collective mutual aid and support under the situation where the aftermath of the disasters is not yet eradicated and the damage caused by the accident at the nuclear power plant is on the steady increase.

articles.title: Statement of DPRK NDC Supported in France
articles.content:
Statement of DPRK NDC Supported in France
						
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- The France-Korea Friendship Association expressed full support for the statement issued by a spokesman for the National Defence Commission of the DPRK. 
					 The June 2 statement released by the Association urged the south Korean authorities to respect the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration and thoroughly implement them.
					 It noted that the association would introduce the DPRK's reasonable proposals for peace and conduct positive solidarity activities to urge the U.S. to replace the armistice agreement by a peace agreement.

articles.title: Statement of General Staff of KPA Favored in Britain
articles.content:
Statement of General Staff of KPA Favored in Britain 
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on June 4 in support of the statement issued by a spokesman for the General Staff of the Korean People's Army. 
					 The statement said that the south Korean puppet regime's moves against the DPRK and reunification have gone beyond the limit and reached an unimaginable phase.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 It was quite natural that the General Staff of the KPA clarified its stand to take a thousand-fold revenge upon the south Korean puppet forces. 
					
					 The crimes committed by the Lee Myung Bak puppet clique betrayed its despicable true colors as they put those perpetrated by the successive sycophants and traitors of south Korea into the shade. 
					
					 Lee will face the same fate as that of the successive sycophants and traitors forsaken by the nation. 
					
					 The Juche idea and Songun idea followers in Britain fully support the said statement. 
					
					 We urge the Lee regime to unconditionally and immediately apologize for it has done.

articles.title: Anniversary of 6. 15 Joint Declaration Observed in Colombia
articles.content:
Anniversary of 6. 15 Joint Declaration Observed in Colombia
						
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- The Colombia-Korea Association of Friendship and Culture issued its bulletin titled "Story of June 15" on June 2 on the occasion of the 47th anniversary of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration. 
					 The bulletin in an article said that stories about what happened when the historic June 15 joint declaration, a landmark of the country's reunification, was published still move many people. 
					
					 Under the subtitles "Handshake of century", "exception and exception" and "Wife seated away from the president" the bulletin said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il came out to the airport without any prior notice and cordially met President Kim Dae Jung, greatly stirring the world all of a sudden. 
					
					 He boarded the limousine carrying Kim Dae Jung, not wedded to the established practice, and accompanied him to the state guest house amid the warm welcome of hundreds of thousands of people. 
					
					 During the banquet Kim Jong Il saw the first lady sitting at another table. Asking Kim Dae Jung why he himself was making his family a divided one, Kim Jong Il invited her who did not know what to do with herself to sit at the main table.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Popular Personality Praised in Mexico
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Popular Personality Praised in Mexico
						
Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- The Mexican Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea issued the 77th issue of its bulletin on the occasion of the 47th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of his work at the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The bulletin carried a portrait of Kim Jong Il and an article titled "Son of People."
					
					  The article noted that Kim Jong Il always respects the people saying that if there is an almighty being in the world, it is the people. Citing facts to prove his popular personality, the article went on:
					
					 The politics pursued by him is one for the people and the socialist system centered on the popular masses was built in the DPRK as he respects people as a teacher, believing in them as in Heaven and considers himself as their son and faithful servant. 
					
					 He always tells officials to be very modest with unassuming character before the people.
					
					 He has made forced marches for tireless field guidance in the true sense of the word to build a thriving socialist nation in the DPRK where people will live with nothing to desire more in the world.

articles.title: DPRK's Significant Days Observed Abroad
articles.content:
DPRK's Significant Days Observed Abroad
						
Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) --Diverse events were held in different countries from May 26 to June 2 to mark the 47th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of his work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 11th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration. They included a meeting and a photo exhibition in Romania, a seminar in the Czech Republic and a reading session in Guinea.
					 On display in the venue of the photo exhibition were photographs on the undying feats of Kim Jong Il and other photos on the struggle of the Korean people for building a thriving nation. 
					
					 Constantin Rotaru, chairman of the Romanian Socialist Union, in his speech said that Kim Jong Il developed the WPK into an invincible party. 
					
					 He stressed that the Korean people foiled the imperialists' moves by dint of single-minded unity more powerful than a nuclear weapon, and have won victories only in the struggle to accomplish the socialist cause under the leadership of the WPK. 
					
					Jaroslav Kafka, chairman of the Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association and chairman of the Czech Group for the Study and Materialization of the Juche Idea, praised Kim Jong Il for having enriched and developed the revolutionary idea and theory of President Kim Il Sung in the whole period of his work at the WPK Central Committee, performing great feats in party building and activities.
					
					 Riyad Chaloub, chief of the Guinean Group for the Study of February 16 Art, stressed that the June 15 joint declaration serves as an invariable banner for the movement for Korea's reunification. 
					
					 A message to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the seminar in the Czech Republic. 
					
					 Chairman M. Gamrul Huda and General Secretary Sheikh Rafiqul Islam Bablu of the Bangladesh Institute of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on June 2 on the occasion of the 47th anniversary of Kim Jong Il's start of his work at the WPK Central Committee.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Posted on British Internet Homepage
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Posted on British Internet Homepage
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun posted on its Internet homepage the full text of President Kim Il Sung's work "Let Us Fight on Staunchly for the Liberation of the Fatherland" on June 2. 
					 The work, published on June 4, Juche 26 (1937), referred to the Japanese imperialists' fascist suppression and plunder and indicated tasks arising in accomplishing the cause of national liberation and so on. 
					
					 Also posted on the homepage was a photograph of the President kindling the torch of national liberation to flare up in the nocturnal sky above Pochonbo and indicating the road to be followed by the Korean nation.

articles.title: Chinese Xinhua News on Hwanggumphyong and Wihwa Islands Economic Zone
articles.content:
Chinese Xinhua News on Hwanggumphyong and Wihwa Islands Economic Zone 
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- The Chinese Xinhua News on Tuesday reported in detail about the decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK on setting up the Hwanggumphyong and Wihwa Islands Economic Zone.
					 It said that the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly promulgated the decree on setting up the economic zone to further strengthen the DPRK-China friendship and expand and develop external economic relations. 
					
					 The sovereignty of the DPRK would be exercised over the zone and the development of the zone would start from the Hwanggumphyong district, it added.

articles.title: Chinese Paper Introduces DPRK Law on Tour of Mt. Kumgang
articles.content:
Chinese Paper Introduces DPRK Law on Tour of Mt. Kumgang
						
 Beijing, June 7 (KCNA) -- The Chinese paper Huan Qiu Shibao on June 3 introduced the DPRK's Law on the Special Zone for International Tour of Mt. Kumgang.
					 It said:
					
					 According to a report, the law consists of six chapters and 41 articles.
					
					 Its mission is to set up a proper system and order in developing and managing and operating the special zone so as to make a contribution to developing Mt. Kumgang into a world famous special zone for tour.
					
					 The law stipulates that foreign juridical persons, individuals, economic bodies and south Koreans and overseas compatriots can invest in the special zone. For example, they can build such tourist facilities as hotel, restaurant and golf course.
					
					 The DPRK will make efforts to provide the investors with all kinds of privileges and an environment favorable for investment in the future.
					
					 For instance, they will freely use mail service, telephone, fax, Internet and other communication facilities.
					
					 The paper explained in detail the background against which the above-said law was enacted.

articles.title: Unphung Joint Venture Company
articles.content:
Unphung Joint Venture Company
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- The Xinhua News Agency of China on Monday carried an article titled "The Unphung Joint Venture Company, product of China-DPRK economic cooperation". The article was dedicated by Xinhua correspondent to Pyongyang Zhang Li.
					 The article said that at the working place of the company the reporter witnessed feed additives being steadily churned out after going through several production processes and workers doing mixing, packing and other work in good order. 
					
					 The domestic demand for "Unphung" brand additives has risen in state stock farms and other units in different parts of the country. 
					
					 The production started from 2006 and the DPRK side holds 45 percent of its shares while the Chinese side 55 percent. 
					
					The annual production capacity of the company is 30,000 tons and it produces 43 kinds of additives of seven series for pigs, cows, poultry and fishes.
					
					 Its total property stands at over 21 million RMB.Y and in 2006-2011 period it earned revenue valuing at 15.21 million RMB.Y. 
					
					 The DPRK party and state have paid deep attention to the feed-making industry as it is related with improving the standard of people's living. The company, therefore, has bright prospect of development and the production has gained dynamism. The business is now going full steam ahead and the enthusiasm of its employees run high, bringing greater profits. 
					
					 The successful management of the company steadily improves its image while its products are winning ever-growing popularity in the DPRK. 
					
					 The Chinese director of the company said that the business boom is unthinkable apart from the steady development of the China-DPRK economic cooperation. He stressed that the company intensifies the formation of sales network in conformity with growing competition and plans to build a breeding ground and a pulverized fish production shop.

articles.title: China Underlines Importance of Helping Millions of College Graduates Find Jobs
articles.content:
China Underlines Importance of Helping Millions of College Graduates Find Jobs
						
 Beijing, June 7 (KCNA) -- Chinese Vice-Premier Zhang Dejiang, member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the Communist Party of China, on June 2 reiterated the importance of creating jobs for millions of college graduates.
					 Zhang's remarks came two days after the State Council, or China's cabinet, issued a circular asking local authorities to create supportive policies that will help college graduates find jobs.
					
					 Zhang said that it was the primary task for creating jobs in China to help college graduates find jobs, calling for hitting the target of their employment through the above-said campaign.

articles.title: Method of Managing Probation Period for Public Servants Enforced in China
articles.content:
Method of Managing Probation Period for Public Servants Enforced in China
						
 Beijing, June 7 (KCNA) -- A method of managing the probation period for the temporally employed public servants was put into force in China. 
					 The probation period is one year. 
					
					 The public servants temporally employed according to the above-said method should undergo overall tests upon the expiry of that period. 
					
					 Those who failed in the tests are not employed.

articles.title: Moscow's Drive to Improve Health Service for Children
articles.content:
Moscow's Drive to Improve Health Service for Children
 Moscow, June 7 (KCNA) -- Moscow of Russia is now directing big efforts to improving the health service for children. 
					 The mayor of Moscow said at a meeting on June 6 that the city government would allot more than 32 billion Rbl for health service for children in the two years to come.

articles.title: Colombian President Calls for Better Environmental Protection
articles.content:
Colombian President Calls for Better Environmental Protection
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- Colombian President Juan Manuel Santos called for greater efforts in environmental protection during his visit to native communities in the north of the country on Sunday.
					 Santos praised people of Sierra Nevada communities for their culture based on respect for nature and environment and warned his fellow countrymen of the serious consequences of disappearing rain forest.
					
					 "The entire world must follow this advice because we cannot continue destroying the environment and the nature...," he said.

articles.title: Iran Warns of Retaliation against West's Sanctions
articles.content:
Iran Warns of Retaliation against West's Sanctions
 Tehran, June 7 (KCNA) -- Iranian First Vice-President Mohammad Reza Rahimi in an interview with a news agency on June 4 dismissed effectiveness of West's economic sanctions on Iran and warned that any further unilateral sanction would be reciprocated seriously.
					 "Certain countries resort to sanctions in order to stop Iran's progress. We will pursue the same approach and will give response to their small action with the biggest reaction," Rahimi stressed.
					
					 He stated: Iran does not need nuclear weapons at all. It uses (nuclear) technology only for scientific advancement.

articles.title: US Drone Strikes Kill 21 in NW Pakistan
articles.content:
US Drone Strikes Kill 21 in NW Pakistan
						
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- Colombian President Juan Manuel Santos called for greater efforts in environmental protection during his visit to native communities in the north of the country on Sunday.
					 Santos praised people of Sierra Nevada communities for their culture based on respect for nature and environment and warned his fellow countrymen of the serious consequences of disappearing rain forest.
